Argentina femicides keep rising after record last year, observatory saysFemicides in Argentina, already at a record level last year, have increased further in the first two months of 2024, a report from a local observatory on Friday showed, with more than one killing per day underscoring the deadly threat to women. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:42:40 GMT HVG2ZOZSLBK3BNCBO75X4S62VQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-femicides-keep-rising-after-record-last-year-observatory-says-2024-03-01/Candelaria Grimberg世界美洲
UN rights chief: blocking aid to Sudan could be a war crimeThe United Nations human rights chief on Friday said that the apparent deliberate denial of safe access for humanitarian agencies within war-torn Sudan could amount to a war crime. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:41:17 GMT K7EPFFUNWFKEFHOFC5YXHH3XPI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-rights-chief-blocking-aid-sudan-could-be-war-crime-2024-03-01/Reuters世界非洲
Canada bans indirect imports of Russian diamondsCanada on Friday announced restrictions on indirect imports of Russian diamonds weighing 1 carat and above in a coordinated move with other Group of Seven (G7) countries. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:32:01 GMT ZFTI3AVQKRN3DDSUVLJQO27XEI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/canada-bans-indirect-imports-of-Russian-diamonds-2024-03-01/Reuters市场商品
Fighting returns to capital of Ethiopia's Amhara regionEthiopian government forces battled militiamen on Friday in the capital of the Amhara region, Bahir Dar, the regional administration and residents said, in the first fighting there since the early days of the conflict last year. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:10:10 GMT灯GWKHXZZMH7IYLM3TO6EH5FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/fighting-returns-capital-ethiopia-amhara-region-2024-03-01/Reuters世界非洲
Progressive US Democrats defend Cuba trip, will seek changesTwo Democratic U.S. lawmakers who just returned from Cuba pushed back against Republicans' criticism of the trip, calling on President Joe Biden's administration to ease restrictions on relations with the Communist-ruled island. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:00:50 GMT YE2IMQNNKNMSFDTLMUM3PSABBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/progressive-us-democrats-defend-cuba-trip-will-seek-changes-2024-03-01/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Pressure mounts for inquiry into Israeli troops firing on Gazans waiting for aidPressure mounted on Israel on Friday over the deaths of Palestinians queuing for aid in an incident during which its soldiers fired at the crowd, with several countries backing a U.N. call for an inquiry. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 13:08:17 GMT N4MIPM2NAFMHHMJWEZTW5V64PE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/stress-mounts-inquiry-into-israeli-troops-firing-gazans-waiting-aid-2024-03-01/John Irish, James Mackenzie世界中东地区
German government needs TikTok, Scholz says, as AfD surges in pollsGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz said he wants the government to open an account on TikTok, with concerns about the far right AfD's strong social media presence seemingly trumping security worries about the Chinese-owned platform. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 13:02:44 GMT 6JZGI76JWBO2BBJESDN2耻辱https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-government-needs-tiktok-scholz-says-afd-surges-polls-2024-03-01/Andreas Rinke, Sarah Marsh世界欧洲
Belgium to use urgent procedure status for nuclear phase-out lawBelgium's Chamber of Representatives has agreed to give the nuclear phase-out law an urgent procedure status, a spokesperson for Energy Minister Tinne van der Straeten said on Friday, confirming a report from Belga news agency. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:36:22 GMT FCA6MDUCZJM7NLWHKJRJ6Y52WE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgium-use-emergency-procedure-status-nuclear-phase-out-law-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish farmers take grain protests to Lithuanian borderPolish farmers protested on the border with Lithuania on Friday against what they say are imports of Ukrainian grain through the Baltic country, something Vilnius denies. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:29:16 GMT PEXVP4FHORJTVDLAIFFYOBGHTU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-take-grain-protests-lithuanian-border-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Mexico kicks off election campaign with ruling party's Sheinbaum in leadMexico's presidential candidates will start their campaigns on Friday for elections in June, with the ruling party candidate leading in a race that will likely crown a woman to lead Latin America's second-largest nation for the first time. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:03:53 GMT OBROMMEY7RI2PHDUJYEBONMMLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-kicks-off-election-campaign-with-ruling-party-sheinbaum-lead-2024-03-01/Diego Oré世界美洲
Prince Harry lawyers win permission to use payment records at Mirror Group court caseBritain's media minister said on Friday she had agreed to allow documents submitted to a public inquiry to be used by lawyers acting for Prince Harry, singer Elton John and other claimants in their lawsuit against the publisher of the Daily Mail. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:12:00 GMT XCWZC2RS35L3TO2SJMHO74FB5I https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-minister-allows-prince-harry-to-use-inquiry-details-lawsuit-2024-03-01/Reuters世界英国
